description: Mucius Scaevola Thrusting His Right Hand into the Flames before Lars Porsenna; Master from Konstanz (Christoph Bockstorffer) (Swiss, about 148? - 1553), or Matthäus Gutrecht the Younger (German, died 1534, active 1506); Switzerland; about 1530 - 1540; Pen and black ink, gray and two shades of yellow wash and red chalk; 43.7 x 32.7 cm (17 3/16 x 12 7/8 in.); 88.GG.6; J.
